title: Pun Pun Market
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Thai, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened spring 2014, this natural food store and restaurant has a garden and hosts workshops. The menu at this location is different than its other ones. Isaan (northeastern Thai) food, curries, soups, fusion wraps, salads, organic coffee, shakes and smoothies. Directions: From intersection at Airport Plaza go south on Hang Dong road for 250 meters, on your left will be Tyre Plus shop with a Michelin Man sign, take the first left after the sign down the small street, the place is on the left at the long aluminum fence with the earthen buildings and big space.
